Content.summary: 'Umbraco Backup public beta available' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson written on 02 August 2006
Content.bodyText:
A public beta of Umbraco backup is available from the project homepage. Please don't be shy. Tell me what you think. Report bugs, suggest features.

I am aiming to have 1.0 out in a week or so. It's not too late to include any requested functionality.
